category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Tc_Extension_Connect_Client
preference.preference_description:
Specifies the server name that will be used while setting up the socket communication between the Teamcenter Excel Live and RAC.
Valid Values: * MachineName : The socket communication between the TC Excel Live and RAc will be established using machine name. * localhost: The socket communication between the TC Excel Live and RAc will be established using locahost. * IP: The socket communication between the TC Excel Live and RAC will be established using IP address.
